member.name: M:DSharpPlus.DiscordShardedClient.GetShard(System.UInt64)
member.summary:
Gets a shard from a guild ID.
If automatically sharding, this will use the method. Otherwise if manually sharding, it will instead iterate through each shard's guild caches.
member.param: The guild ID for the shard.
member.returns: The found shard. Otherwise if the shard was not found for the guild ID.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.DiscordShardedClient.GetShard(DSharpPlus.Entities.DiscordGuild)
member.summary:
Gets a shard from a guild.
If automatically sharding, this will use the method. Otherwise if manually sharding, it will instead iterate through each shard's guild caches.
member.returns: The found shard. Otherwise if the shard was not found for the guild.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.DiscordConfiguration
member.summary: Represents configuration for and .

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.DiscordConfiguration.Token
member.summary: Sets the token used to identify the client.

summary.para: Sets the type of the token used to identify the client.
Defaults to .
Sets the minimum logging level for messages.
Typically, the default value of is ok for most uses.
Sets whether to rely on Discord for NTP (Network Time Protocol) synchronization with the "X-Ratelimit-Reset-After" header.
If the system clock is not synced, setting this to true will ensure ratelimits are synced with Discord and reduce the risk of hitting one.
This should only be set to false if the system clock is synced with NTP.
Defaults to true.
Allows you to overwrite the time format used by the internal debug logger.
Only applicable when is set left at default value. Defaults to ISO 8601-like format.
Sets the member count threshold at which guilds are considered large.
Defaults to 250.
Sets whether to automatically reconnect in case a connection is lost.
Defaults to true.
Sets the ID of the shard to connect to.
If not sharding, or sharding automatically, this value should be left with the default value of 0.
Sets the total number of shards the bot is on. If not sharding, this value should be left with a default value of 1.
If sharding automatically, this value will indicate how many shards to boot. If left default for automatic sharding, the client will determine the shard count automatically.
Sets the level of compression for WebSocket traffic.

Disabling this option will increase the amount of traffic sent via WebSocket. Setting will enable compression for READY and GUILD_CREATE payloads. Setting will enable compression for the entire WebSocket stream, drastically reducing amount of traffic.
Defaults to .
Sets the size of the global message cache.
Setting this to 0 will disable message caching entirely. Defaults to 1024.
Sets the proxy to use for HTTP and WebSocket connections to Discord.
Defaults to null.
Sets the timeout for HTTP requests.
Set to to disable timeouts.
Defaults to 10 seconds.
Defines that the client should attempt to reconnect indefinitely.
This is typically a very bad idea to set to true, as it will swallow all connection errors.
Defaults to false.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.DiscordConfiguration.AlwaysCacheMembers
member.summary:
Sets whether the client should attempt to cache members if exclusively using unprivileged intents.
This will only take effect if there are no or intents specified. Otherwise, this will always be overwritten to true.
Defaults to true.

summary.para: Sets the gateway intents for this client.
If set, the client will only receive events that they specify with intents.
Defaults to .
Sets the factory method used to create instances of WebSocket clients.
Use and equivalents on other implementations to switch out client implementations.
Defaults to .
Sets the factory method used to create instances of UDP clients.
Use and equivalents on other implementations to switch out client implementations.
Defaults to .
Sets the logger implementation to use.
To create your own logger, implement the instance.
Defaults to built-in implementation.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.DiscordConfiguration.LogUnknownEvents
member.summary: Whether to log unknown events or not. Defaults to true.

member.summary: Creates a new configuration with default values.

member.summary: Creates a clone of another discord configuration.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.Entities.OAuthScope
member.summary: Represents the possible OAuth scopes for application authorization.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.OAuthScope.Identify
member.summary: Allows /users/@me without email.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.OAuthScope.Email
member.summary: Enables /users/@me to return email.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.OAuthScope.Connections
member.summary: Allows /users/@me/connections to return linked third-party accounts.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.OAuthScope.Guilds
member.summary: Allows /users/@me/guilds to return basic information about all of a user's guilds.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.OAuthScope.GuildsJoin
member.summary: Allows /guilds/{guild.id}/members/{user.id} to be used for joining users into a guild.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.OAuthScope.GuildsMembersRead
member.summary: Allows /users/@me/guilds/{guild.id}/members to return a user's member information in a guild.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.OAuthScope.GdmJoin
member.summary: Allows your app to join users into a group DM.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.OAuthScope.Rpc
member.summary: For local RPC server access, this allows you to control a user's local Discord client.
member.remarks: This scope requires Discord approval.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.OAuthScope.RpcNotificationsRead
member.summary: For local RPC server access, this allows you to receive notifications pushed to the user.
member.remarks: This scope requires Discord approval.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.OAuthScope.RpcVoiceRead
member.summary: For local RPC server access, this allows you to read a user's voice settings and listen for voice events.
member.remarks: This scope requires Discord approval.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.OAuthScope.RpcVoiceWrite
member.summary: For local RPC server access, this allows you to update a user's voice settings.
member.remarks: This scope requires Discord approval.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.OAuthScope.RpcActivitiesWrite
member.summary: For local RPC server access, this allows you to update a user's activity.
member.remarks: This scope requires Discord approval.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.OAuthScope.Bot
member.summary: For OAuth2 bots, this puts the bot in the user's selected guild by default.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.OAuthScope.WebhookIncoming
member.summary: This generates a webhook that is returned in the OAuth token response for authorization code grants.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.OAuthScope.MessagesRead
member.summary: For local RPC server access, this allows you to read messages from all client channels (otherwise restricted to channels/guilds your application creates).

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.OAuthScope.ApplicationsBuildsUpload
member.summary: Allows your application to upload/update builds for a user's applications.
member.remarks: This scope requires Discord approval.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.OAuthScope.ApplicationsBuildsRead
member.summary: Allows your application to read build data for a user's applications.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.OAuthScope.ApplicationsCommands
member.summary: Allows your application to use application commands in a guild.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.OAuthScope.ApplicationsStoreUpdate
member.summary: Allows your application to read and update store data (SKUs, store listings, achievements etc.) for a user's applications.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.OAuthScope.ApplicationsEntitlements
member.summary: Allows your application to read entitlements for a user's applications.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.OAuthScope.ActivitiesRead
member.summary: Allows your application to fetch data from a user's "Now Playing/Recently Played" list.
member.remarks: This scope requires Discord approval.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.OAuthScope.ActivitiesWrite
member.summary: Allows your application to update a user's activity.
member.remarks: Outside of the GameSDK activity manager, this scope requires Discord approval.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.OAuthScope.RelationshipsRead
member.summary: Allows your application to know a user's friends and implicit relationships.
member.remarks: This scope requires Discord approval.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.Entities.VerificationLevel
member.summary: Represents guild verification level.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.VerificationLevel.None
member.summary: No verification. Anyone can join and chat right away.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.VerificationLevel.Low
member.summary: Low verification level. Users are required to have a verified email attached to their account in order to be able to chat.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.VerificationLevel.Medium
member.summary: Medium verification level. Users are required to have a verified email attached to their account, and account age need to be at least 5 minutes in order to be able to chat.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.VerificationLevel.High
member.summary: ( verification level. Users are required to have a verified email attached to their account, account age need to be at least 5 minutes, and they need to be in the server for at least 10 minutes in order to be able to chat.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.VerificationLevel.Highest
member.summary: () verification level. Users are required to have a verified phone number attached to their account.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.DefaultMessageNotifications.AllMessages
member.summary: All messages will trigger push notifications.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Entities.DefaultMessageNotifications.MentionsOnly
member.summary: Only messages that mention the user (or a role he's in) will trigger push notifications.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.Net.DiscordUri
member.summary: An URI in a Discord embed doesn't necessarily conform to the RFC 3986. If it uses the attachment:// protocol, it mustn't contain a trailing slash to be interpreted correctly as an embed attachment reference by Discord.

member.summary: The type of this URI.

member.summary: Returns a string representation of this DiscordUri.

member.summary: Converts this DiscordUri into a canonical representation of a if it can be represented as such, throwing an exception otherwise.
member.returns: A canonical representation of this DiscordUri.
member.exception: If is not , as that would mean creating an invalid Uri, which would result in loss of data.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Net.DiscordUriType.Standard
member.summary: Represents a URI that conforms to RFC 3986, meaning it's stored internally as a and will contain a trailing slash after the domain name.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Net.DiscordUriType.NonStandard
member.summary: Represents a URI that does not conform to RFC 3986, meaning it's stored internally as a plain string and should be treated as one.
